text: Timile tiniharula'i marenau, tara allahale nai tiniharula'i maryo ra tapa'ile matoko dallo phyamknu bha'ena baru tyo mahana allahale phyamkyo, ra yasa karana ki musalamanaharula'i aphno tarphabata uniharuko parisramako ramro pratiphala de'os. Nihsandeha allaha dherai sunnevala, dherai jannevala cha
